address.data.note

Class NoteAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • address.data.note.NoteAction

  • public class NoteAction
extends java.lang.Object
    The NoteAction class performs all operation on Note object i.e. Storing in database and retrieving from database.
    Since:
    15 April 2016
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Shravya Mahankali
